page.title: 04Bourton's Attractions (2)
page.content: Bourton-on-the-Water also has a{Motor {Museum}housed in an old{Corn Mill}near the bridge by the War Memorial. Here you will see an interesting collection of{30 vehicles,}advertising slogans and an{exhibition of village life.} Yet another attraction is the{Windrush {Trout Farm}near the car park, where you can enjoy a picnic whilst watching the trout at various stages of development. This is a working farm and fresh{trout and salmon}may be purchased daily. The{Model Railway}in the High Street has over 400 square feet of track layout with trains moving through mountains, suburbia and open countryside. Visitors may operate the trains, both British and Continental, by push button.
